text: int main ( ) { int dong ; scanf ( "%d" , & dong ) ; while ( dong -- ) { int mang [ 100000 ] ; int sopt , i = 0 , j = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & sopt ) ; while ( i < sopt ) { scanf ( "%d" , & mang [ i ] ) ; i ++ ; } int cost = 0 ; while ( j < sopt ) { if ( mang [ j ] < mang [ j + 1 ] ) cost = cost + mang [ j ] ; else if ( mang [ j ] > mang [ j + 1 ] ) cost = cost + mang [ j + 1 ] ; j ++ ; sopt -- ; } printf ( "%d\n" , cost ) ; } return 0 ; }
